LANGFLOW_PORT.description: The internal port that langflow will run from.

LANGFLOW_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: The superuser password. IMPORTANT: Store this value as a secret using Google's Secret Manager.

LANGFLOW_DATABASE_URL.description: The URL of your postgres database. IMPORTANT: Store this value as a secret using Google's Secret Manager.

LANGFLOW_DB_CONNECTION_SETTINGS.description: The default connection settings. These settings work well with the free Supabase Postgres instance.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Your Google Generative AI API Key. Get one from Google AI Studio. IMPORTANT: Store this value as a secret using Google's Secret Manager.

LANGFLOW_SECRET_KEY.description: A fernet key used to ensure encryption remains consistent across workers. IMPORTANT: Store this value as a secret using Google's Secret Manager.

LANGFLOW_AUTO_LOGIN.description: Defines whether you can access langflow without providing login credentials.

LANGFLOW_WORKERS.description: The number of langflow workers. The more workers, the more requests can be processed in parallel.

LANGFLOW_SAVE_DB_IN_CONFIG_DIR.description: This setting applies to instances using an SQLite Database rather than postgres. We're not going to use this for the cloud run deployment as it breaks very quickly.

LANGFLOW_STORE_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES.description: Defines whether the environment variables get saved to the database. This shouldn't be necessary, but API keys get lost if set to false at the moment.
